message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it can greatly benefit your operations and increase efficiency. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects the quality and potential impact of the product on your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I am willing to consider a middle ground. To move forward, I propose a counteroffer of $11000 for the product. This price still reflects the value and quality of the product while being more accommodating to your financial situation.
